newsitem.title: CHINA: PRESS DIGEST - Shanghai newspapers - June 18.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Shanghai newspapers - June 18.

text.p: Following is a summary of major political and business stories in local newspapers, prepared by Reuters in Shanghai. Reuters has not checked the stories and does not guarantee their accuracy.
- SHANGHAI SECURITIES NEWS - The official "Outlook" weekly has published a commentary saying China's stock markets will rise in 1997 but gains will be in line with steady economic growth.
- Members of the Shanghai stock exchange have begun to move to the exchange's new building in Pudong.
- Prospects for cooperation between the Shanghai and Hong Kong stock exchanges will be bright after China takes over the British colony on July 1.
- BUSINESS NEWS - The start of interbank state debt trading on Monday signals a significant improvement in China's monetary system with bank funds effectively separated from the stock markets.
